description: Comprehensive Proxmox VE monitoring: InfluxDB native metrics + Prometheus PVE exporter (ZFS, disks, sensors)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "cpu")
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "uptime" and r.object == "qemu")
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "uptime" and r.object == "lxc")
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "cpu")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 100.0}))

import "join"

used = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory" and r._field == "memused")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "_joinkey", value: "x")

total = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory" and r._field == "memtotal")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "_joinkey", value: "x")

join.inner(left: used, right: total, on: (l, r) => l._joinkey == r._joinkey, as: (l, r) => ({_value: float(v: l._value) / float(v: r._value) * 100.0}))

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory" and r._field == "memtotal")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory" and r._field == "memused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Used")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory" and r._field == "memtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Total")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "avg1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "1 min")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "avg5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "5 min")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "avg15")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "15 min")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and (r._field == "used" or r._field == "total"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/ and r["type"] == "rootdir")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r.used) / float(v: r.total) * 100.0, _field: "used_pct"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "wait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "IOWait")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 1.0 - r._value, _field: "Idle"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cpu" or r._field == "mem" or r._field == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_field"])
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host", "nodename", "cpu", "mem", "uptime"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "qemu" and r._field == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "qemu" and r._field == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "qemu" and (r._field == "netin" or r._field == "netout"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: if r._field == "netin" then "In" else "Out"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "qemu" and (r._field == "diskread" or r._field == "diskwrite"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: if r._field == "diskread" then "Read" else "Write"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cpu" or r._field == "mem" or r._field == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_field"])
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host", "nodename", "cpu", "mem", "uptime"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "lxc" and r._field == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "lxc" and r._field == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "lxc" and (r._field == "netin" or r._field == "netout"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: if r._field == "netin" then "In" else "Out"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.object == "lxc" and (r._field == "diskread" or r._field == "diskwrite"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: if r._field == "diskread" then "Read" else "Write"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and (r._field == "used" or r._field == "avail"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v: r.used), _field: "used_pct"}))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail", "used"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "nics" and (r._field == "netin" or r._field == "netout"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: if r._field == "netin" then "In" else "Out"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field", "host"])

title: Proxmox VE
